title: News: Tyler, The Creator drops snippets from GOBLIN
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/05/goblin.jpg "goblin")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/7202-news-tyler-the-creator-drops-snippets-from-goblin/attachment/goblin)

With _Goblin’s_ release just over a week away, **Tyler, the Creator** has dropped snippets from all 18 tracks from the LP. As expected, the sounds are brash, grotesque and wonderfully obnoxious. What’s also evident however, is a clear personal and dare I say it tender undercurrent that could make this album a classic. If you don’t mind spoilers, check it out bellow.
